ygData.subject: Question about fighting skills
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail bards of Norrath: I ve seen a lot of posts about keeping all your skills maxed so you don t pay for it later on and this seems like sound advice. My
ygData.messageBody:
Hail bards of Norrath:

I've seen a lot of posts about keeping all your skills maxed so you don't
pay for it later on and this seems like sound advice. My question is how do
you do it? I have switched off between 1H slash, 1H blunt, pierce and HtoH
and now I am back about 15 points from my cap on all of them. I level before
I can get even one of them up to my cap. Will this change as leveling gets
harder or am I 'chasing the goose'? Thanks in advance,

Zendarin
The Wandering Minstrel
Fennin Ro (Sword-bard to the KTC)
